amendment.description: Amendment requires the Secretary of Homeland Security to implement at primary inspection points at U.S. ports of entry the Stolen and Lost Travel Document database managed by Interpol.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 21 printed in House Report 110-136 to require the Secretary of Homeland Security to implement at primary inspection points at U.S. ports of entry the Stolen and Lost Travel Document database managed by Interpol.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Royce amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A016) offered by Mr. Royce.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Royce amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.
